name: PleIAs/YouTube-Commons
description: YouTube-Commons, a dataset by PleIAs, is a comprehensive collection of 2,063,066 audio transcripts from YouTube videos. The dataset, which includes transcripts in English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, and Russian, comprises 22,709,724 original and automatically translated transcripts, totaling nearly 45 billion words. This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers, developers, and anyone interested in natural language processing, conversation analysis, and machine learning, offering a unique insight into the conversational patterns and trends on YouTube.
citeAs: @article{PleIAs_YouTube-Commons,   title={YouTube-Commons: A Collection of Multilingual Transcripts from CC-BY Licensed YouTube Videos},   author={PleIAs},   year={2024},   url={https://huggingface.co/datasets/PleIAs/YouTube-Commons},  note={A collection of 2,063,066 audio transcripts from 3,156,703 videos (721,136 individual channels) shared on YouTube under a CC-By license. The dataset comprises 22,709,724 original and automatically translated transcripts, representing nearly 45 billion words in total. All the videos were shared on YouTube with a CC-BY license, providing all the necessary provenance information. The dataset can be found at: https://huggingface.co/datasets/PleIAs/YouTube-Commons.}, }
creator: PleIAs
inLanguage: en, fr, es, pt, de, ru
